name: Connected Worlds (sh1ft15)
description:
Submission for the game jam "DevSquad Academy Jam".  For this submission, I was experimenting with two-way aiming, meaning that the player can only aim in two directions (left or right). 

Credits :
Conspiracy Theory - David_Fesliyan
Felix Blume - Night close to a river crickets and frogs bird sometimes
Opticaillusions - Lab ambience

Controls:
WASD : Move
Left-Click: Shot (Hold for longer range)
